DemoMod:Invincible.NAME: Invincible
DemoMod:Invincible.DESCRIPTION: You can only lose !M! more HP each turn.

DemoMod:Spice.NAME: Spice
DemoMod:Spice.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 maximum HP, Gain !M! Strength, draw 1 card. Whenever you play this card, increase the chance of this card appearing in the card reward screen. NL Exhaust.

DemoMod:BlackBlade.NAME: Black Blade
DemoMod:BlackBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.Apply BlackBlade equals to the damage dealt by this card.

DemoMod:WhiteBlade.NAME: White Blade
DemoMod:WhiteBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.Apply WhiteBlade equals to the damage dealt by this card.

DemoMod:BSG.NAME: BSG
DemoMod:BSG.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. If the damage dealt by this card is not completely Blocked by the enemy, Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:BalloonGun.NAME: Balloon Gun
DemoMod:BalloonGun.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage 3 times. When drawn, Apply Flight. When you lose HP in this combat, this card will Exhaust automatically. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:RustySidearm.NAME: Rusty Sidearm
DemoMod:RustySidearm.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. NL SemiAutomatic. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:ManualReload.NAME: Manual Reload
DemoMod:ManualReload.DESCRIPTION: Select a Gun card from your discard pile, Reload and return to your hand.
DemoMod:ManualReload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select a Gun card from your discard pile and draw pile, Reload and return to your hand.

DemoMod:TableSutra.NAME: Table Sutra
DemoMod:TableSutra.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random TableTech card to your hand.

DemoMod:TableTechSight.NAME: Table Tech:Sight
DemoMod:TableTechSight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This turn, your next Gun is fired twice. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.
DemoMod:TableTechSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This turn, your next two Guns are fired twice. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

DemoMod:TableTechMoney.NAME: Table Tech:Money
DemoMod:TableTechMoney.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! gold. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

DemoMod:TableTechShotgun.NAME: Table Tech:Shotgun
DemoMod:TableTechShotgun.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

DemoMod:TableTechHeat.NAME: Table Tech:Heat
DemoMod:TableTechHeat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

DemoMod:TableTechRage.NAME: Table Tech:Rage
DemoMod:TableTechRage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Strength.At the end of your turn, lose !M! Strength. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

DemoMod:TableTechBlanks.NAME: Table Tech:Blanks
DemoMod:TableTechBlanks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Block for each enemy in combat. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

DemoMod:TableTechStun.NAME: Table Tech:Stun
DemoMod:TableTechStun.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Stun ALL non boss enemies this turn. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

DemoMod:TripleGun.NAME: Triple Gun
DemoMod:TripleGun.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Capacity 3:Deal !D! damage. Capacity 2:Deal !D! damage twice. Capacity 1: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: damage twice. Capacity 1: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:FinishedGun.NAME: Finished Gun
DemoMod:FinishedGun.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. Capacity 1：Increase the damage by !DemoModExtraDamage! ,Deal damage equals to this enemy want to deals damage points to you. SemiAutomatic. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:HighKaliber.NAME: High Kaliber
DemoMod:HighKaliber.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Apply !M! OutOfBody. Deal !D! damage. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:SAA.NAME: SAA
DemoMod:SAA.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. When this card is Reload, draw !M! cards. SemiAutomatic. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Behold!.NAME: Behold!
DemoMod:Behold!.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. Select any number of Guns from discard pile and draw pile, put into your hand. NL Exhaust.
DemoMod:Behold!.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. Select any number of Guns from discard pile and draw pile, put into your hand. NL Exhaust.

DemoMod:Roll.NAME: Roll
DemoMod:Roll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Select and Reload a Gun card from your hand.

DemoMod:Unity.NAME: Unity
DemoMod:Unity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage for each Gun you have.

DemoMod:FastSwitch.NAME: Fast Switch
DemoMod:FastSwitch.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Look at a card at the top of the draw pile. If this card is a Gun, you can put it into your hand.
DemoMod:FastSwitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Put a Gun from your draw pile into your hand.

DemoMod:DoubleSwitch.NAME: Double Switch
DemoMod:DoubleSwitch.DESCRIPTION: Select and Reload at most 2 Guns from your hand.

DemoMod:StickyCrossBow.NAME: Sticky Crossbow
DemoMod:StickyCrossBow.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! ExplosiveArrow. SemiAutomatic. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:RadGun.NAME: Rad Gun
DemoMod:RadGun.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. If Reload on full Capacity, double its base damage, or reset its base damage. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
DemoMod:RadGun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. If Reload on full Capacity or Capacity is 2, double its base damage, or reset its base damage. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Rummage.NAME: Rummage
DemoMod:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: Draw 4 cards. Discard cards that are not Guns.
DemoMod:Rummage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 4 cards. Discard cards that are not Guns. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

DemoMod:Eureka.NAME: Eureka!
DemoMod:Eureka.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you have drawn !M! Guns. Exhaust.

DemoMod:FightSabre.NAME: Fightsabre
DemoMod:FightSabre.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! Damage. When this card is Reload, Gain !B! Block. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Gungine.NAME: Gungine
DemoMod:Gungine.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage twice. Exhaust ALL Curse and Status cards from your hand. When this card is Reload, Gain [E] 。 NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
DemoMod:Gungine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage !DemoModMulti! times. NL Exhaust ALL Curse and Status cards from your hand. When this card is Reload, Gain [E] [E] 。 NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:EasyReloadBullets.NAME: Easy Reload Bullets
DemoMod:EasyReloadBullets.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill, fill 1 Capacity for a random Gun card from your hand(Won't trigger Reload).
DemoMod:EasyReloadBullets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you play a Skill, fill 1 Capacity for a random Gun card from your hand(Won't trigger Reload).

DemoMod:PotionOfGunFriendShip.NAME: Potion Of Gun Friendship
DemoMod:PotionOfGunFriendShip.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL Gun cards in your hand for the rest of combat. Exhaust.
DemoMod:PotionOfGunFriendShip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL Gun cards for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

DemoMod:DoubleVision.NAME: Double Vision
DemoMod:DoubleVision.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Gun is fired twice.
DemoMod:DoubleVision.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Guns are fired twice.

DemoMod:ChanceBullets.NAME: Chance Bullets
DemoMod:ChanceBullets.DESCRIPTION: Each gun you fire has a !M!% chance of being replaced by a random one you have.
DemoMod:ChanceBullets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each gun you fire has a !M!% chance to add a random one you have.

DemoMod:SkilledReload.NAME: Skilled Reload
DemoMod:SkilledReload.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have a Reload, Draw 1 card.

DemoMod:Slinger.NAME: Slinger
DemoMod:Slinger.DESCRIPTION: ALL Guns can still deal damage when the Capacity is empty. NL ALL Guns will be Exhaust when the Capacity is empty.

DemoMod:CursedBullets.NAME: Cursed Bullets
DemoMod:CursedBullets.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to half of your curse points.
DemoMod:CursedBullets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Gain Strength equal to half of your curse points.

DemoMod:ShadowBullets.NAME: Shadow Bullets
DemoMod:ShadowBullets.DESCRIPTION: Each gun you fire has a !M!% chance to fired twice.

DemoMod:BattleInHaste.NAME: Battle In Haste
DemoMod:BattleInHaste.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 random Gun from your draw pile into your hand.
DemoMod:BattleInHaste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! random Guns from your draw pile into your hand.

DemoMod:Casey.NAME: Casey
DemoMod:Casey.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this card kills an enemy, Deals overflow damage to another random enemy !M! times the damage.

DemoMod:FullFirepower.NAME: Full Firepower
DemoMod:FullFirepower.DESCRIPTION: Your next Gun will be fired repeatedly until the Capacity is empty. Exhaust.
DemoMod:FullFirepower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next Gun will be fired repeatedly until the Capacity is empty.

DemoMod:BlankBullets.NAME: Blank Bullets
DemoMod:BlankBullets.DESCRIPTION: Each gun you fire has a !M!% chance to Stun an enemy this turn.

DemoMod:HuntsMan.NAME: Huntsman
DemoMod:HuntsMan.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 4 times. When this card is Reload, Gain !B! Block. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:TeaPot.NAME: Tea Pot
DemoMod:TeaPot.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. Capacity 1:Increase the damage by !DemoModExtraDamage!. When this card is Reload, Gain !M! Omega. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Charge.NAME: Charge
DemoMod:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Play this card in a charge way.(Additional cost required [E])。

DemoMod:MegaHand.NAME: Megahand
DemoMod:MegaHand.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. Charge: Deal !M! damage. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gun. Target lose !D! HP. Next turn, Stun this enemy and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Switch to default mode. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
Gun. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Take an extra turn after this one. Switch to default mode. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:PlatinumBullets.NAME: Platinum Bullets
DemoMod:PlatinumBullets.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Gun card, Gain 1 Strength or Dexterity.

DemoMod:ChaosBullets.NAME: Chaos Bullets
DemoMod:ChaosBullets.DESCRIPTION: Each gun you fire has a !M!% chance to Apply 1 random negative effect to an enemy.

DemoMod:ConditionalReflex.NAME: Conditional Reflex
DemoMod:ConditionalReflex.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. When you have a Reload, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

DemoMod:JK47.NAME: JK-47
DemoMod:JK47.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. When this card is Reload, Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:SniperShot.NAME: Sniper Shot
DemoMod:SniperShot.DESCRIPTION: Play a Gun card from your discard pile then put into your hand. NL Exhaust.

DemoMod:DirectionalPad.NAME: Directional Pad
DemoMod:DirectionalPad.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. If the last card played this combat was an Attack, Gain !B! Block. Playing when the Capacity is empty, adds a random bonus to the bonus screen and removes the card from your master deck. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Unmoved.NAME: Unmoved
DemoMod:Unmoved.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put the last played Attack this combat into your hand.
DemoMod:Unmoved.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put the last 2 played Attacks this combat into your hand.

DemoMod:DarkMarker.NAME: Dark Marker
DemoMod:DarkMarker.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. Reload on full Capacity to switch the mode. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! * X damage to ALL enemies and Stun them this turn. Exhaust. Reload on full Capacity to switch the mode. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
Gun. Deal !D! damage. Reload on full Capacity to switch the mode. Apply RedMark. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
Gun. Deal !D! damage. Reload on full Capacity to switch the mode. Apply BlueMark. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:StrategicReserve.NAME: Strategic Reserve
DemoMod:StrategicReserve.DESCRIPTION: Put 2 cards from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL At the start of your next turn, Gain [E] [E].
DemoMod:StrategicReserve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put any number of cards from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL At the start of your next turn, Gain [E] [E].

DemoMod:ProbeStrike.NAME: Probe Strike
DemoMod:ProbeStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy not intends to attack, Gain [E] and draw 1 card, Apply !M! Vulnerable, or gain !B! Block.

DemoMod:Evolver.NAME: Evolver
DemoMod:Evolver.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Cannot Upgrade. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever play this 6 times, step up the level permanently. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gun. Cannot Upgrade. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever play this 4 times, step up the level permanently. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
Gun. Cannot Upgrade. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Whenever play this 6 times, step up the level permanently. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
Gun. Cannot Upgrade. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Whenever play this 4 times, step up the level permanently. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
Gun. Cannot Upgrade. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Constrict. NL Whenever play this 6 times, step up the level permanently. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
Gun. Cannot Upgrade. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Constrict. NL Whenever play this 4 times, step up the level permanently. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:MozambiqueDrill.NAME: Mozambique Drill
DemoMod:MozambiqueDrill.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you fire !M! Guns in a single turn, the next card you play will deal double damage.

DemoMod:GunstockTap.NAME: Gunstock Tap
DemoMod:GunstockTap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Select and Reload at most !M! Guns from your hand.

DemoMod:AbyssalTentacle.NAME: Abyssal Tentacle
DemoMod:AbyssalTentacle.DESCRIPTION: Gun. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Constrict. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:LifeOrb.NAME: Life Orb
DemoMod:LifeOrb.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage !DemoModMulti! times. NL If this card kills an enemy, This card causes the same damage points to ALL enemies as the sum of the maximum HP of all enemies slain in the next Reload in this game. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Replace.NAME: Replace
DemoMod:Replace.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
DemoMod:Replace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

DemoMod:FeignSurrender.NAME: Feign Surrender
DemoMod:FeignSurrender.DESCRIPTION: Discard All Attacks. NL Draw the number of cards discarded.
DemoMod:FeignSurrender.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard All Attacks. NL Draw the number of cards discarded(Draw at least 2).

DemoMod:ThirdPartyController.NAME: Third Party Controller
DemoMod:ThirdPartyController.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. NL If target is not boss, Control this enemy. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Flaw.NAME: Flaw
DemoMod:Flaw.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain 1 Vulnerable. Ethereal.

DemoMod:RatTrap.NAME: Rat Trap
DemoMod:RatTrap.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, if you've played Attacks in this turn, Take !M! damage and add a *Dazed into your draw pile then Exhaust.

DemoMod:AWP.NAME: A.W.P.
DemoMod:AWP.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the only Gun in your hand, double its damage. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Purify.NAME: Purify
DemoMod:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Select a card from your master deck to remove with this card together. Exhaust.
DemoMod:Purify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Select a card from your master deck to remove with this card together.

DemoMod:Deposit.NAME: Deposit
DemoMod:Deposit.DESCRIPTION: When drawn !M! times in this combat, gain 30 gold and Exhaust this.

DemoMod:PracticeMakesPerfect.NAME: Practice Makes Perfect
DemoMod:PracticeMakesPerfect.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each Gun Reloaded this combat. Draw !M! cards.

DemoMod:BulletBore.NAME: Bullet Bore
DemoMod:BulletBore.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Target lose !D! HP. Next turn, Stun this enemy and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:GunslingerForm.NAME: Gunslinger Form
DemoMod:GunslingerForm.DESCRIPTION: All Reload triggered effects can now also be triggered when the Gun is fired. Ethereal.
DemoMod:GunslingerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All Reload triggered effects can now also be triggered when the gun is fired.

DemoMod:Elimentaler.NAME: Elimentaler
DemoMod:Elimentaler.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Congeal. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:EatIt.NAME: Eat It!
DemoMod:EatIt.DESCRIPTION: Choose to kill a non boss enemy or deal 40 damage to a boss enemy.

DemoMod:Ejector.NAME: Ejector
DemoMod:Ejector.DESCRIPTION: Select a Gun from your hand and clear its Capacity.
DemoMod:Ejector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose any number of Guns from your hand and clear their Capacity.

DemoMod:GunShield.NAME: Gun Shield
DemoMod:GunShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !B! Block for each Gun in your hand.

DemoMod:AC15.NAME: AC-15
DemoMod:AC15.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. NL Lose ALL Block. The damage of this card in this combat increases the lost Block value. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:OldTrick.NAME: Old Trick
DemoMod:OldTrick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put the last played Skill this combat into your hand.

DemoMod:ZorGun.NAME: Zor Gun
DemoMod:ZorGun.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. When this card is Reload, play the top !M! card(s) of your draw pile and costs 1 more [E]. Whenever this card enter the discard pile, costs 1 less [E]. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Desperate.NAME: Desperate
DemoMod:Desperate.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Whenever you draw a Gun, gain [E].

DemoMod:Camera.NAME: Camera
DemoMod:Camera.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Capacity 1:Stun ALL enemies this turn. NL If the Capacity has been lowered to 0, Exhaust. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:BlackHoleGun.NAME: BlackHole Gun
DemoMod:BlackHoleGun.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Everyone lose !M! Strength this turn. Empty all the Guns Capacity in the discard pile. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile. NL Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:Polaris.NAME: Polaris
DemoMod:Polaris.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. Whenever you play twice, promoted one level (up to level 3) in this game. When you lose HP in a combat, reduce one level in this game. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
DemoMod:Polaris.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gun. SemiAutomatic. Deal !D! damage. Whenever you play twice, promoted one level (up to level 3) in this game. When you lose HP in a combat, reduce one level in this game. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:SuppressiveFire.NAME: Suppressive Fire
DemoMod:SuppressiveFire.DESCRIPTION: Turn a Gun in your hand into SemiAutomatic this turn.
DemoMod:SuppressiveFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Turn ALL of the Guns in your hand into SemiAutomatic this turn.

DemoMod:FortunesFavor.NAME: Fortune's Favor
DemoMod:FortunesFavor.DESCRIPTION: Gain half of the total damage's Block that all enemies want to deals to you.

DemoMod:BoxingGlove.NAME: Boxing Glove
DemoMod:BoxingGlove.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. If this card kills an enemy, gain a mark(Up to 3). NL Charge: Lose ALL marks, double its damage for lose each mark. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:MachoBrace.NAME: Macho Brace
DemoMod:MachoBrace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Select and Reload a Gun card from your hand. Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

DemoMod:CombinedRifle.NAME: Combined Rifle
DemoMod:CombinedRifle.DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage !DemoModMulti! times. Reload to switch the mode. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gun. Deal !D! damage. Reload to switch the mode. Capacity !DemoModCapacity!.

DemoMod:HungryBullets.NAME: Hungry Bullets
DemoMod:HungryBullets.DESCRIPTION: In this battle, for every !M! Guns you fire, gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.
